name: Death Game Royale
summary:
Accused of crimes you didn't commit, you suddenly find yourself fighting for your life alongside actual criminals! The only way to survive these death games is to assemble a team, but how do you know who to trust?

As you begin to work together, you notice your teammates are looking at you as more than just an ally. Will you sweep them away with your sharp wits and charm or will you lead them to purgatory?
